The Regional Centre discussed the strengthening of safety measures in schools

Society♪53 minutes ago.

A round table was held at the Regional Centre on how to prevent the recurrence of the tragedy that occurred at the Bryan school. A meeting of relevant departments, teachers and sympathizers was held at the initiative of Senator RF, member of the committee on science, education and culture, Artem Malachenkov.

The residents of Smolenska complain massly about the current roofs.

Society♪9 hours ago.

Ottepel changed the freeze and rain was snowfall. What about cleaning streets and yards? The smearing pity on this matter is still much more than grateful. Although snow and waking, there's still a lot of snow, especially in the yards and on the sidewalks, which clean up the residual principle.

On the Smolnche, electrical circuit breaks continue to be removed due to weather

Society♪9 hours ago.

Weather disruptions in the region have resulted not only in the formation of sogrobes and soycles, but also in the healing of wires, and there is also a vicious wind in the regions. As a result, large-scale electrical power cuts have been recorded in many areas due to wire failures. In social networks, people complain about lack of electricity in homes. In the Smole region, the Electric Safety Headquarters will be set up to deal with the consequences of the weather.

To share the news.

On the Smolnche, electrical circuit breaks continue to be removed due to weather
